General.Name: Mitra Keluarga Karyasehat Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Mitra Keluarga Karyasehat Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, owns and operates hospitals in Indonesia. It provides healthcare services; and operates a pharmacy. The company's hospital network comprises of Mitra Keluarga hospitals and Kasih Group hospitals located in Jakarta, Bekasi, Cikarang, Depok, Cibubur, Tangerang, Sukabumi, Karawang, Cirebon, Surabaya, Cibinong, Subang, and Tegal. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Mitra Keluarga Karyasehat Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Griyainsani Cakrasadaya.
General.Address: Jalan Raya Gading Kirana Kav. 2, Jakarta, Indonesia, 14240
